ai-tha-ap175:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap175:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap175:1.4_0: to the branch of the gods.
ai-tha-ap175:2.3_0: Having lifted up the root of a tree,
ai-tha-ap175:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap175:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap175:3.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap175:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Scripture.
